channel.title: Givemod command
channel.description:
I am currently using the hybrid pvp V3 source. And i would like to know how to add a give mod command?
Thanks In advance
Regards, Johnl17

item.title: Givemod command
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

You telling everyone to stop posting is just making people post more.

Read full topic

/end please

My advice, delete your server. Hybrid pvp is way overused in the rsps community right now, and needs to be extinguished.

item.title: Givemod command
item.dc:creator: @Mayhem2 Mayhem,
item.description:
@Mayhem2 wrote:

[quote=“Snipa, post:5, topic:411799”][quote author=Mayhem, link=topic=513052.msg3724268#msg3724268 date=1314150079]

well he beat me to it but you don’t really need a givemod command you can just change player rights in the characters file but this takes longer.

----------EDIT-----------

if (playerCommand.startsWith("givemod")) { try { String playerToG = playerCommand.substring(8); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToG)) { Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerRights = 1; c.sendMessage("You have given "+Misc.optimizeText(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName)+" the position: @blu@Moderator"); Server.playerHandler.players[i].disconnected = true; } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }

wait shouldn’t you add a rights in that code? so only admins or up can make mods

It’s Hybridpvp don’t need.
[/quote]

Ahh… Never coded on Hybridpvp. Didn’t know that Ya learn somethin’ new everyday :D[/quote]
I don’t even work with PI, yet I can still figure it out.

Read full topic

thanks for quick responce
